required_dirs.doc: A list of configuration keys that describe directories that must exist in the project root

forbidden_routes.doc: A list of routes that may not be created (either as an identical or partial match).

files_glob.doc: A glob pattern to find all files in a directory and its subdirectory. By default we exclude files that start with an underscore

component_partial_prefix.doc: The prefix used to namespace component partials

component_lang_namespace.doc: The top-level namespace in component localization JSON

page_lang_namespace.doc: The top-level namespace in page-level localization JSON

external_components_glob.doc: A glob used to discover components in the external components directory

external_components_list.doc: A list of named external components. If non-empty, it will be used in preference to the glob discovery
